 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵאָה‎</span><sub>34</sub> **proper name, feminine** ==Leah==, elder daughter of Laban, and wife of Jacob (perhaps = ***wild-cow***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) [compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָחֵל‎</span> ***ewe***], [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Prol. 80</sup> [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>K 219 and</sup> (doubtfully) [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xl. 1886, 167</sup>; also [[BDB#Gray|Gray]]<sup>Heb. Names, 96</sup>; others as [[BDB#Hpt|Hpt]]<sup>GGN 1883, 100</sup> compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***li'at,***</u></abbr> in sense ***mistress***; on possibly relation of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵאָה‎</span> to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִוֵי‎</span> see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִוֵי‎</span>); — mother of Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, Zebulun and Dinah; [[Gen.29.16|Gen 29:16]]; [[Gen.29.17|Gen 29:17]]; [[Gen.29.23|Gen 29:23]]; [[Gen.29.24|Gen 29:24]]; [[Gen.29.25|Gen 29:25]]; [[Gen.29.30|Gen 29:30]]; [[Gen.29.31|Gen 29:31]]; [[Gen.29.32|Gen 29:32]] (compare v[[Gen.29.33|Gen 29:33]] v[[Gen.29.34|Gen 29:34]] v[[Gen.29.35|Gen 29:35]]) [[Gen.30.9|Gen 30:9]] + 15 t. [[Gen.31.32|Gen 31:32]]; [[Gen.33.1|Gen 33:1]]; [[Gen.33.2|Gen 33:2]]; [[Gen.33.7|Gen 33:7]]; [[Gen.34.1|Gen 34:1]]; [[Gen.35.23|Gen 35:23]]; [[Gen.35.26|Gen 35:26]]; [[Gen.46.15|Gen 46:15]]; [[Gen.46.18|Gen 46:18]]; [[Gen.49.31|Gen 49:31]]; [[Ruth.4.11|Ruth 4:11]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Λ</span>(<span class="bdbLangGreek">ε</span>)<span class="bdbLangGreek">ια</span>.
